overview: Welcome to L.A. -- Hunk Capital of the Universe. You can't drive around this town without catching sight of gorgeous men everywhere -- at the car wash, the supermarket, the office: construction workers, executives, bikers, hitchhikers. Did you ever fantasize about them getting totally naked naked just for you? L.A. Dream Men takes you on a sexy sight-seeing tour as seven of L.A.'s hottest studs come home with you and strip out of their clothes to show off every inch of their perfect bodies. Spy on the men of your dreams with your naked eyes. The L.A. Dream Men are here waiting for you.
tagline: SO HANDSOME... SO MASCULINE... SO NAKED... SO L.A!
title: LA Dream Men
